title: ERoots
description:
A full-stack web application designed to empower a women's self-help group in Kenya. Built to streamline local produce sales and reduce food waste, this platform features a robust product catalogue, reservation system, and admin dashboard.

Technical Highlights

  • Frontend: Next.js & Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive UI.
  • Backend: MongoDB & AWS S3 for scalable data and asset management.
  • Quality Assurance: End-to-end testing with Cypress and automated CI/CD via GitLab.

title: Portfolio Website
description:
A comprehensive showcase of my technical skills and design philosophy, built from the ground up to be performant, responsive, and visually engaging. This project serves not just as a portfolio, but as a demonstration of modern web engineering practices.

Core Architecture

  • Frontend: Svelte & Vite for a reactive, compiled-away UI.
  • Backend: Spring Boot (Java 21) handling API requests.
  • Deployment: Containerized with Docker and deployed via Koyeb.

Key Features

  • Theme System: Sophisticated light/dark mode with custom transition animations.
  • Live Tech Demos: Integrated simulators running directly in the browser.
  • Responsive Design: Glassmorphism-inspired UI adapting to all devices.
